scripts.auto-debug-e2etest: npm run build && npm run debug-e2etest --
scripts.auto-debug-interactionstest: npm run build && npm run debug-interactionstest --
scripts.auto-e2etest-rdb: rdb stream -new -realm chromium:public -- npm run auto-e2etest --
scripts.auto-e2etest-parallel: npm run build && npm run e2etest-parallel --
scripts.auto-e2etest-parallel-rdb: rdb stream -new -realm chromium:public -- npm run auto-e2etest-parallel --
scripts.auto-interactionstest: npm run build && npm run interactionstest --
scripts.auto-interactionstest-rdb: rdb stream -new -realm chromium:public -- npm run auto-interactionstest --
scripts.auto-screenshotstest: npm run build && third_party/node/node.py --output scripts/test/run_test_suite.js --config test/interactions/test-runner-config.json --mocha-fgrep '[screenshot]'
scripts.auto-screenshotstest-rdb: rdb stream -new -realm chromium:public -- npm run auto-screenshotstest --
scripts.auto-unittest-rdb: rdb stream -new -realm chromium:public -- npm run auto-unittest --
scripts.bake-strings: npm run collect-strings && vpython third_party/node/node.py --output third_party/i18n/bake-strings.js front_end/core/i18n/locales
scripts.check: npm run check-lint && npm run check-loc
scripts.check-lint: vpython third_party/node/node.py --output scripts/test/run_lint_check_js.mjs && vpython third_party/node/node.py --output scripts/test/run_lint_check_css.js
scripts.start: node -e 'console.log(`This script has been removed in favor of --custom-devtools-frontend. For more information, see https://docs.google.com/document/d/1COgCBWWuTh2o-Zbp6h_z0h0LtlJaimaEDsION4RZPxc/edit?usp=sharing`);'
